ReportTitle.ReportName: 麻醉医生月工作量统计
ReportTitle.StrSql: SELECT GZL.DOCNAME2 DOCID, NVL(USERS.USER_NAME, GZL.DOCNAME2) DOCNAME, SUM(GZL.ZMSL2) ZMSL1, FUN_CONVERT_MINUTETOCHAR(SUM(GZL.ZMSJ2)) ZMSJ1, SUM(GZL.ONE2) ONE1, SUM(GZL.TWO2) TWO1, SUM(GZL.THREE2) THREE1, SUM(GZL.OTHER2) OTHER1, sum(M_ONE2 ) M_ONE1 , sum(M_TWO2) M_TWO1, sum(M_THREE2) M_THREE1, sum(M_FOUR2) M_FOUR1, sum(M_FIVE2) M_FIVE1, sum(M_SIX2) M_SIX1, sum(M_SEVEN2) M_SEVEN1, sum(M_EIGHT2) M_EIGHT1, sum(M_NINE2) M_NINE1, sum(M_TEN2) M_TEN1 FROM (SELECT NVL(H.USER_JOB_ID, GZLMX.DOCNAME0) DOCNAME2, SUM(ZMSL0) ZMSL2, SUM(ZMSJ0) ZMSJ2, SUM(ONE) ONE2, SUM(TWO) TWO2, SUM(THREE) THREE2, SUM(OTHER) OTHER2, sum(M_ONE ) M_ONE2 , sum(M_TWO) M_TWO2, sum(M_THREE) M_THREE2, sum(M_FOUR) M_FOUR2, sum(M_FIVE) M_FIVE2, sum(M_SIX) M_SIX2, sum(M_SEVEN) M_SEVEN2, sum(M_EIGHT) M_EIGHT2, sum(M_NINE) M_NINE2, sum(M_TEN) M_TEN2 FROM (SELECT GZL1.DOCNAME0, GZL1.ZMSL0, GZL1.ZMSJ0, NL1.ONE, NL1.TWO, NL1.THREE, NL1.OTHER, mzfa.M_ONE, mzfa.M_TWO, mzfa.M_THREE, mzfa.M_FOUR, mzfa.M_FIVE, mzfa.M_SIX, mzfa.M_SEVEN, mzfa.M_EIGHT, mzfa.M_NINE, mzfa.M_TEN FROM (select ANES_DOCTOR as DOCNAME0,count(1) as ZMSL0,SUM(FUN_GET_TWODATE_MINUTE_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, ANES_END_TIME)) ZMSJ0 from V_OPERATION_MASTER_V2 WHERE OPER_STATUS_CODE > 35 AND TO_CHAR(ANES_START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM') = :MONTHS AND ANES_DOCTOR is not null GROUP BY ANES_DOCTOR) GZL1, (SELECT DOCNAME, ONE, TWO, THREE, OTHER FROM (SELECT ANES_DOCTOR DOCNAME, CASE WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, DATE_OF_BIRTH) < 24 THEN '小于1岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, DATE_OF_BIRTH) < 84 THEN '小于6岁' WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(ANES_START_TIME, DATE_OF_BIRTH) > 960 THEN '大于80岁' ELSE '其他' END AGE FROM V_OPERATION_MASTER_V2 A WHERE OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 AND TO_CHAR(ANES_START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM') = :MONTHS AND ANES_DOCTOR is not null) PIVOT(COUNT(AGE) FOR AGE IN('小于1岁' ONE, '小于6岁' TWO, '大于80岁' THREE, '其他' OTHER)) ORDER BY DOCNAME) NL1, (select docname1 M_DOCNAME, sum(one) M_ONE, sum(two) M_TWO, sum(three) M_THREE, sum(four) M_FOUR, sum(five) M_FIVE, sum(six) M_SIX, sum(seven) M_SEVEN, sum(eight) M_EIGHT, sum(nine) M_NINE, sum(ten) M_TEN from (select ANES_DOCTOR docname1, CASE WHEN AnesMethod in（ '全麻', '全身麻醉' ） then '全麻' WHEN AnesMethod in（ '全麻+神经阻滞', '全麻+神经阻滞麻醉' ） then '全麻+神经阻滞' WHEN AnesMethod in（ '全麻+腰硬联合','全麻+腰硬联合麻醉' ） then '全麻+腰硬联合' WHEN AnesMethod in（ '椎管内麻醉','蛛网膜下腔麻醉', '硬膜外腔麻醉', '腰硬联合麻醉' ） then '椎管内麻醉' WHEN AnesMethod in（ '神经阻滞', '神经阻滞麻醉' ） then '神经阻滞' WHEN AnesMethod in（ '基础麻醉' ） then '基础麻醉' WHEN AnesMethod in（ '基础+神经阻滞','基础+神经阻滞麻醉' ） then '基础+神经阻滞' WHEN AnesMethod in（ '腰麻+神经阻滞','腰麻+神经阻滞麻醉' ） then '腰麻+神经阻滞' WHEN AnesMethod in（ '局部浸润', '局部浸润麻醉', '局麻', '局部麻醉' ） then '局麻' ELSE '其他' END AnesMethod1 FROM V_OPERATION_MASTER_V2 a WHERE OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and to_char(anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS AND ANES_DOCTOR is not null ) pivot(count(AnesMethod1) for AnesMethod1 in('全麻' one, '全麻+神经阻滞' two, '全麻+腰硬联合' three, '椎管内麻醉' four, '神经阻滞' five, '基础麻醉' six, '基础+神经阻滞' seven, '腰麻+神经阻滞' eight, '局麻' nine, '其他' ten)) group by docname1 order by DOCNAME1) mzfa WHERE GZL1.DOCNAME0 = NL1.DOCNAME(+) and GZL1.DOCNAME0 = mzfa.M_DOCNAME(+) ) GZLMX LEFT JOIN MED_USERS H ON GZLMX.DOCNAME0 = H.USER_NAME GROUP BY NVL(H.USER_JOB_ID, GZLMX.DOCNAME0)) GZL, MED_HIS_USERS USERS WHERE GZL.DOCNAME2 = USERS.USER_JOB_ID(+) AND (GZL.DOCNAME2 LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' OR USERS.USER_JOB_ID LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' OR USERS.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or :VDOCNAME is null) GROUP BY GZL.DOCNAME2, NVL(USERS.USER_NAME, GZL.DOCNAME2) ORDER BY NVL(USERS.USER_NAME, GZL.DOCNAME2)
ReportTitle.ModelFileName: 麻醉医生月工作量统计

ReportTitle.StrSql: select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%')

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.ANES_DOCTOR LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.ANESTHESIA_DOCTOR LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%')

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and ( a.FIRST_ANES_ASSISTANT LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' or a.AnesDoctor1 LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' or a.SECOND_ANES_ASSISTANT LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' or a.AnesDoctor2 LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' or a.third_anes_assistant LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' or a.FOURTH_ANES_ASSISTANT LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' )

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and MONTHS_BETWEEN(a.ANES_START_TIME, a.DATE_OF_BIRTH) < 24

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and MONTHS_BETWEEN(a.ANES_START_TIME, a.DATE_OF_BIRTH) < 84 and MONTHS_BETWEEN(a.ANES_START_TIME, a.DATE_OF_BIRTH) >= 24

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and MONTHS_BETWEEN(a.ANES_START_TIME, a.DATE_OF_BIRTH) > 960

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ('全麻','全身麻醉')

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ('全麻+神经阻滞','全麻+神经阻滞麻醉')

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ( '全麻+腰硬联合','全麻+腰硬联合麻醉' )

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ( '椎管内麻醉','蛛网膜下腔麻醉', '硬膜外腔麻醉', '腰硬联合麻醉' )

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ( '神经阻滞', '神经阻滞麻醉' )

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ( '基础麻醉' )

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ( '基础+神经阻滞','基础+神经阻滞麻醉' )

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ( '腰麻+神经阻滞','腰麻+神经阻滞麻醉' )

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod in ( '局部浸润', '局部浸润麻醉', '局麻', '局部麻醉' )

select a.patient_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') = :MONTHS and (a.anesdoctor LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%' or a.AnesDoctorIds LIKE '%' || :VDOCNAME || '%') and a.AnesMethod not in ( '全麻', '全身麻醉','全麻+神经阻滞', '全麻+神经阻滞麻醉' ,'全麻+腰硬联合','全麻+腰硬联合麻醉' ,'椎管内麻醉','蛛网膜下腔麻醉', '硬膜外腔麻醉', '腰硬联合麻醉' ,'神经阻滞', '神经阻滞麻醉' ,'基础麻醉' ,'基础+神经阻滞','基础+神经阻滞麻醉' ,'腰麻+神经阻滞','腰麻+神经阻滞麻醉' ,'局部浸润', '局部浸润麻醉', '局麻', '局部麻醉' )
